data.prayer: Lord, the believers in the county of Var, Provence-Alpes-Côte d‘Azur, France need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Var, Provence-Alpes-Côte d‘Azur, France

data.prayer: Father, encourage the 12,597 believers to have boldness before you, since they have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus the Son of God.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 81 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, bless the county of Var with a multiplying movement of house churches.
data.verse: ...but indeed, as I live, all the earth will be filled with the glory of the Lord.

data.prayer: Jesus, teach the local leaders in Var, Provence-Alpes-Côte d‘Azur, France to be humble and to serve others.
data.verse: It shall not be so among you. But whoever would be great among you must be your servant, and whoever would be first among you must be your slave, even as the Son of Man came not to be served but to serve, and to give his life as a ransom for many.

data.prayer: Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Berber, Mozabite people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
Jesus, please bless the leaders of the the county of Var, Provence-Alpes-Côte d‘Azur, France who work hard at shepherding and guiding your people.
data.verse: With upright heart he shepherded them and guided them with his skillful hand.

data.prayer: Spirit, protect the overcomers in Var, Provence-Alpes-Côte d‘Azur, France, so that they will one day sit with Jesus on His throne.
data.verse: He who overcomes, I will give to him to sit down with me on my throne, as I also overcame, and sat down with my Father on his throne.

data.prayer: Spirit, inspire new kinds of evangelism through social media in Var, Provence-Alpes-Côte d‘Azur, France.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist, discharge all the duties of your ministry.

location.name: Var
location.cities_list: Toulon, La Seyne-sur-Mer, Fréjus, Hyères, Draguignan
